body: The constellation, [ White Clothed Phantom ] confused and dislike this questionable content for certain amount of reason

Third and foremost its shown not all is lost for these women and that there is a 'personality switch' so that the kidnapped women come back to senses albeit confused about their current predicament, if so the company could make more money promising millionaires and billionaires an ageless body(just minus the brainwashing) than kidnapping women and selling them to kissless virgins lol. Its more legal this way too, people spend a sizeable portion of their money buying makeup and other shit to fake looking young, with this forever youth portion, all men will work up to turn themselves into 10/10 model looking robots and  women will voluntarily turn themselves into 10/10 gynoids.

What is even the point of these robots? If they have the tech to create such life like robots already then there is no point in kidnapping young women and turning them into robots, you can just make these robots from scratch already. It looks like the body parts of these women are already swapped with 100% cybernetic implants, so there is no economic difference between making one from scratch and making one from using another women. 
If its the 'emotions' that these robots lack, then its made mute when they are all turned into expressionless fleshlights. It would have made sense that if these women were brainwashed to emulate a personality to the liking of customers but thats not what happens here.
I’m just waiting for them to rise up like a bunch of terminators
This series just makes me sad, since they make it clear the person modifying them doesn't care about them at all
That onsen page really drives home how amazing this tech would be
